text:
Hi all,

I am trying to follow the guide below to setup a login page on my website. Unfortunately I am unable to find the option "Control Audience Access Page." The only option I see on my webpage is "Require Password to View the Page." All this does is create a universal password, but I am wanting to create a user signup page. Can anyone help with this?

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/require-member-registration-to-access-private-content>
Hey <@U037QL6S6P5>! Do you have CMS Hub Enterprise?
Hi <@U02NJACH5QS> I am on CMS Hub Professional
Is this an enterprise only feature?
